body.name: Timberland Men's 35mm Classic Jean Belt
features: Mens leather belt made with 100% genuine leather with single loop antique finish buckle
Perfect mens casual belt that will soon become your favorite go to everyday leather belt
The perfect mens belt for jeans that can also convert into a mens dress belt and work belt

Sizing: 1. 25" Wide, Order 1 size larger than your pant size for the best fit. To ensure the perfect fit, add two to your pant size; that way, the belt will fit comfortably in the third hole. So if you wear a size 34 pant, order a size 36 belt
Timberland makes heavy duty leather belts for men that are designed to look great and last long
body.description: This classic street-worthy belt by Timberland is designed for all-season wear and fits your lifestyle no matter who you are or how you wear it. The men's belt is made of genuine full-grain leather that is smooth to the touch and has rich color to it. Timberland unique culture and product designs are inspired by their rich new England heritage. Everything they make has been founded upon the outdoor lifestyle - whether that involves wooded trails or city streets - and a Timberland community that thrives on giving back.Dieser klassische Streetworthy Gürtel von Timberland ist für ganzjährige Abnutzung konzipiert und passt zu Ihrem Lebensstil egal wer Sie sind oder wie Sie ihn tragen. Der Herrengürtel ist aus echtem Vollnarbenleder, das sich glatt anfühlt und eine satte Farbe hat. Timberland einzigartige Kultur und Produktdesigns sind inspiriert von ihrem reichen New England Erbe. Alles, was sie herstellen, wurde auf dem Outdoor-Lifestyle gegründet - egal ob Wald-Trails oder Stadtstraßen – und einer Timberland-Gemeinschaft, die das Zurückgeben gedeiht.Este cinto clássico digno de rua da Timberland é projetado para todas as estações e combina com o seu estilo de vida, não importa quem você é ou como você o usa. O cinto masculino é feito de couro legítimo de flor integral, suave ao toque e tem uma cor rica. A cultura exclusiva da Timberland e os designs de produtos são inspirados por sua rica herança da Inglaterra. Tudo o que eles fazem foi baseado no estilo de vida ao ar livre – quer isso envolva trilhas florestais ou ruas da cidade – e uma comunidade Timberland que prospera ao retribuir.바지 사이즈보다 두 사이즈 크게 벨트를 구매하는 것이 좋습니다. 따라서 보통 허리 86.4cm(34인치) 바지를 입으신다면 91.4cm(36인치) 벨트를 구입하세요.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete Your Look And Match Your Style With One Of Our Other Timberland Accessories Listed Below Timberland Men's Belts If you’re on the work site, in the office or just walking around the city, do it in style with one of our belts. Timberland offers a number of different styles, ranging from leather belts, reversible belts and canvas belts. Find the belt that fits your lifestyle below. Timberland Toiletry Bags Keep all your personal items organized with one of our convenient travel kits. With a variety of colors, shapes and materials you will find the perfect toiletry bag to match your needs. Take a look below at our collection of men's travel kits and stay organized in style. Timberland Men's Wallets Timberland has a number of different leather and non-leather wallets. In our collection we offer trifold, bifold and card carrier wallets. We also have RFID protected wallets to keep your information safe and secure. Take a look below at our collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Timberland Men's Classic Jean Belt - Timeless Style and Exceptional Quality!
reviews.reviewText: The Timberland Men's 35mm Classic Jean Belt is a true testament to the brand's commitment to craftsmanship and style. This belt has become a staple in my wardrobe, offering a perfect blend of timeless design and exceptional quality.The 35mm width strikes the ideal balance, providing a versatile accessory that pairs effortlessly with both jeans and casual trousers. The genuine leather construction not only exudes durability but also develops a rich patina over time, adding character to the belt.The classic design, complete with the iconic Timberland logo on the buckle, elevates the belt's aesthetic appeal. The buckle itself is sturdy and secure, ensuring a reliable closure that stays in place throughout the day.Whether I'm dressing up for a special occasion or adding a finishing touch to my everyday look, the Timberland Classic Jean Belt stands out as a 5-star product. It's a reliable and stylish accessory that transcends trends, making it a must-have for any wardrobe. Highly recommended for those who appreciate quality craftsmanship and enduring style!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Genuine leather belt
reviews.reviewText: Nice belt from a name brand company that appears to be genuine leather, one piece construction, simple but well made to last a long time. Great belt for casual wear with jeans or shorts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Belt is fine, the inside of it seems to get pretty beat up though
reviews.reviewText: I've been wearing this for a couple months or so now. The included images show the amount of cosmetic damage each side has taken in that time. It seems sturdy enough but man the inside is getting shredded... I don't feel like I'm a particularly abusive belt owner, this started happening almost immediately. Still looks good from the outside, at least. Size was good and I like the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I bought two similar belts at the same time. Thios one is much more comfortable. It's thick and rugged and fits easily. The finish is smooth and it molds easily without being too thin. I wish I would have just bought two of these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is very good.
reviews.reviewText: The material of the belt is good, plus the looks of the belt is the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for. So I ended up buying other, better quality.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this belt for everyday use but had issues after a month. For anyone debating if they should go cheap or buy a quality belt, I have some things to say that may help you decide. The belt DOES look nice. This belt DOES stretch. This belt DOESN't have accurate sizing; I bought a size larger (32) than my pant size, as was suggested, but it barely fit in the second hole. After exchanging it for a size 34 it fit well in the 3rd hole, but fast forward one month later, it gradually stretched out to where I was buckling in the 5th (last) hole. I was tucking my shirt in during this time and that may have caused some stretching. So my suggestion is to get a belt one size bigger than your pant size if you tuck in your shirts because it definitely WILL stretch. The bottom line is, if you need a RELIABLE belt that you know will keep your pants up, I would look elsewhere. It's a good belt, but it's going to act like the price tag reflects, cheap, which is to be expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good quality belt
reviews.reviewText: Been using this belt for a few months now and it's still intact! Material is tacky too, so it doesn't slide around as easily. Very affordable good quality belt!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice belt, pitch black
reviews.reviewText: It's a tiny bit thinner than the pro version and it doesn't have the stitching down the belt so it may wear faster. It is pitch black- not like a grayish black many belts are. This is nice for wearing with jeans. Not a work belt and I don't think it will hold up to hard use. Still, it is a very nice belt and I look forward to using it for many years.
Like the casual style and so far good quality and price for leather belt
Fits small compared to other Timber land belts I have
